Allows you to make a panoramic camera from your phone. The application allows you to take pictures of the whole area. It is very convenient for working with PTGui and other applications for stitching.
All you need is to select the number of belts vertically and the number of sectors in the horizontal plane in the application settings and take pictures according to the icons on the screen.
The number of remaining and taken pictures is displayed in the upper left corner.
All the photos are saved in the Panoramic Camera folder where they can be conveniently exported for further gluing in programs like PtGui.
